reasoning: Pneumococcal infections aggregate umbrella term including invasive disease (meningitis, sepsis, bacteremia at ~5-10 per 100k), pneumonia (~25-30 per 100k), otitis media and sinusitis (~40-50 per 100k). Aggregate BOTEC estimate combining major pneumococcal disease categories globally. Confidence limited due to overlap between categories and geographic variation.
source: Aggregate estimate from WHO and CDC pneumococcal disease surveillance
